faq.name: Verification Info
text: Hello, <@*{userId}>! Here's some info on the verification process...
1. Please allow 24 hours for our mods to verify your ticket (although usually it takes much less).
2. Remember! You need 2 photos to be verified (read the instructions in your ticket carefully).
3. After verification, your ticket is archived privately.
4. If you have other problems, just let us know here, and we'll get back to you.

faq.name: Invite a Friend
faq.description: Explains how to invite a friend to the server
text: Just send them a link to [dvnt.co/links](https://dvnt.co)!

faq.name: Spoilers
faq.description: Explains how to spoiler an image on desktop and mobile
text: On desktop, choose your image, then click the eye icon on the image above the chat bar.
On mobile, choose your image, tap it, then tap 'Mark as Spoiler'.
